[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@rushstack/problem-matcher](./problem-matcher.md) &gt; [IProblemMatcher](./problem-matcher.iproblemmatcher.md)

## IProblemMatcher interface

A problem matcher processes one line at a time and returns an [IProblem](./problem-matcher.iproblem.md) if a match occurs.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface IProblemMatcher 
```

## Remarks

Multi-line matchers may keep internal state and emit on a later line; they can also optionally implement `flush()` to emit any buffered problems when the stream closes.
